column5: Beautiful single story home completely updated and ready for you! Located in Hurst, our home is conveniently located to everything. DFW airport, Dallas Cowboys ATT Stadium, Texas Rangers Stadium, Dallas, Fort Worth and Arlington areas are all in easy reach. Close to major highways, but on a quiet street in a lovely community. Close to major shopping malls and many restaurants and shops.
column8: Beautiful home in Hurst. Easy access to Dallas/FW
